website_summaries.verdict: The combination of this model's attractive design and mid-level price make it worth considering for those who can use it based on the specification limitations.
pros: Features padding throughout, including handles that are super comfortable to grip
cons: Spring is tight at first, requiring time and practice for new users to adapt to it

customer_reviews.title: It seems like its sturdy and well put together
customer_reviews.text: It says its for a kid who weighs 80 pounds, however my daughter weighs 80 pounds and when she steps on it, the pogo stick barely moves down. It seems like its sturdy and well put together. I would just say if your kid is 80 pounds, you're gonna be waiting a while until they can use it.
customer_reviews.author: Mspringer13

customer_reviews.title: So Fun!
customer_reviews.text: We love this. Great way to burn off the wiggles and get the family involved in jumping competitions. I bought this pogo stick specifically because the weight range allows my 60 pound son to enjoy it as well as me, his kid at heart mom, who's weight shall remain a secret but it's well under the 160 pound capacity.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Mom of a feather weight! For 80 lbs and up, not 9 year old and up.
customer_reviews.text: I had bought this for my daughter who is nine. It looks well built, but we weren't ever able to let her enjoy it. This boils down to the title of the product saying for nine and up, and I did not see the information about the weight... My bad! So if your kiddo is under eighty pounds, no matter if they are nine, don't get it. The product looks nice, but we never saw it in action, and I didn't want it to sit for years before she could use it.
customer_reviews.author: Foxhouzer

customer_reviews.title: This pogo stick looks great, but is quite stiff
customer_reviews.text: This pogo stick looks great, but is quite stiff. My 10 year old granddaughter couldn't get it to compress, so her dad had to jump on it to loosen it up.
customer_reviews.author: LTingey

customer_reviews.title: Springs are tight at first, which makes it hard to jump for small kids. So a big adult needs to jump just a few jumps, and that
customer_reviews.text: I got 2 of these for my Grandkids. Ages 8 and 10. And they love them. I need to just do a couple of jumps on it first for them, to break them, just to loosen the springs.Then they both went to jumping. It was so awesome just watching them have fun. But getting excerise also. To get them out of the room and outside and off those dam phones.
customer_reviews.author: norma austin

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, outside fun.
customer_reviews.text: So... we bought one of these because we're desperate for kids activities at this point, and were looking for something fun, physical, and novel. It's been the highlight of the week. It's super fun. Challenging enough to stay interesting. And the stick itself is heavy, seems sturdy, and has held up so far to about two weeks of abuse from some very active 12 year old boys. Mind the weight limit. Dad hopped on, and at 200 lbs, he can use it but it's stretching. I'd totally give one as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: klompen

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 1 day...Fell completely apart after a WEEK!
customer_reviews.text: One day after receiving the pogo stick the rubber piece at the bottom broke off and can not be put back on. Will be returning...So i couldn't return it because i didnt have the box anymore but I wish I had saved it because a few days later it completely fell APART! The pogo stick was in several pieces and could not be put back together. My nephew weighs 90 pounds so he was well within the age and size limits for it. Not worth the money spent!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Dusch

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy and somewhat stiff pogo stick, as described. We bought it for a 10 yr old who just weighs a little under 80 pounds and it is difficult to jump on for very long. Product might loosen up over time and as the child grows. The shaft is rather wide and may bother some knees for children. Overall it is a good value for the price and delivered the quality it described.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Great pogo stick!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent pogo stick for a teen who has an abundance of energy and a moderate level of core strength which is needed to get started. Gets a decent vertical height and is suitable for doing some extreme tricks/ techniques. My teen is highly athletic and very coordinated so the learning curve was less than a 3 days. Other teens who have tried have had more difficulty getting started and staying with it - so you may need to provide support for holding them while they jump and encouragement too. I recommend this product- good luck!!! Tons of smiles for my teen and it’s fun to watch as well.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce B.

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy, broke in half in less than a month of use.
customer_reviews.text: The handle broke in half after less than a month of use from my 10 year old. It was a birthday present that I purchased and wrapped up well before my son's birthday. Although it broke in half after only 3 weeks of use since I had purchased it two months ago Amazon will not warranty it. It only had a 30 day warranty
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My grandson took to this thing like water, trying to beat his grandparents record when ...
customer_reviews.text: My grandson took to this thing like water, trying to beat his grandparents record when they were children. He has really enjoyed this Pogo Stick and it has held up under his constant bounce !
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Came in nice packaging very sturdy and our son loves it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome customer service
customer_reviews.text: My duaghter loves her Pogo. I bought it for a Christmas present and it was the perfect gift for her. However, within the first month she had it, she was jumping in my backyard with it and the rubber stopper on the bottom somehow came off in the lawn. I contacted the seller to order a replacement, they sent one free of charge no questions asked and it arrived within 7 days!
customer_reviews.author: Barrett James

customer_reviews.title: Now, this is fun!
customer_reviews.text: Who knew a toy that I played with back in the 60's would be so much fun for my son? He loves it! I had no idea there were different weight capacities for a pogo stick, so when I shopped for it, I chose one for my son to grow into. Now, he is a master at it. And a bonus... he is getting exercise to boot!
customer_reviews.author: Gregory D. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: I’m having more fun than my son is!
customer_reviews.text: My son is too light to use it which I originally bought it for him. Should’ve gotten one to match his weight but guess what? I’m sure as hell having a blast and re living my child hood 🤣
customer_reviews.author: steven

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made.
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made. The rubber cushion on the foot popped off and was lost within 2 days of use making it lose traction. It slides out easily and leaves dents in anything but concrete when used.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Still going
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old loves this thing. It is the first thing he does when we go to the garage and he looks for reasons to pull it out every chance he gets.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel J LeCour

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a day
customer_reviews.text: Got the pogo stick for my girlfriend's son's birthday and he loved it and it seemed to work really well at first. But quickly found out that the rubber end piece on the bottom was falling off continuously. By the time I was told about this the piece had already fallen out and been lost before I could try and glue it on or anything like that. Would happily change my review if I was contacted with a way to get a replacement part.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan Teal

customer_reviews.title: Received the wrong product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the blue and red and received a black and red one. What a pain the but to have to return and order a new one. Defeats the connivence of ordering something through amazon prime.
customer_reviews.author: MomOfBoys3

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my son!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my son for Christmas and he absolutely loves it. It's got good bounce and he has no problem using it. It seems to be very sturdy and built well. I would buy again for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Devin Kessler

customer_reviews.title: Great bounce
customer_reviews.text: My 12 year old granddaughter loves it, great bounce, she was too heavy for old one. She loved that it was blue
customer_reviews.author: Connalea Howard

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My son absolutely loves this! Perfect for the chunkier kids! The weight limit ia higher then others!
customer_reviews.author: meirishdream

customer_reviews.title: Great for teens
customer_reviews.text: I love it and my older niece and nephew had never been on one and they had a blast on Easter playing with it!
customer_reviews.author: Eileen S

customer_reviews.title: It’s a great pogo stick
customer_reviews.text: Well made. A little tight. But it just could be my granddaughter is learning to jump.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Recommend 75 lbs or more
customer_reviews.text: Would recommend for someone 75 lbs or more. Our 9YO, 55 lb grandson cannot get the spring to budge when jumping.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: pogo stick
customer_reviews.text: My grandsons are both excited with their pogo sticks. What a nice change from screen time.The sticks are very sturdy and look ready to last for years.
customer_reviews.author: Dennie

customer_reviews.title: Holds a 200 pounder. GREAT for the 95 lb child!
customer_reviews.text: My 12 year old, 95 pound son LOVES this pogo stick! It gets used a ton and hasn't given us any issues. It's great quality; I know this because my ding-dong 200 pound husband wanted to give it a go and it didn't break. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Jo Roecker

customer_reviews.title: She really good on her friend's pogo stick and does it very ...
customer_reviews.text: My 9-year-old daughter really wanted this. She wasn't able to use it. Its very stiff and we couldn't get it to bounce. Even I couldn't as an adult get it to bounce. We will be returning it and hope to find one more usable. She really good on her friend's pogo stick and does it very well.
customer_reviews.author: chrystal noble

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my son, he is 10. I only give it 3 stars because you need to be on the heavier side to be able to use it properly, if you don't weigh at least the recommend weight limit, it won't be as enjoyable for your kid. It is very good quality and great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Allred

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Great my son loves it and has it packed down very sturdy I even got on and jumped this is great only problem but didnt matter cause it was awsome was that the color we order we did not get. it was red and blue we order different colors.
customer_reviews.author: Savanna A Acosta

customer_reviews.title: It's great exercise for him - gets him out and away ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my nephew & he loves it! It's great exercise for him - gets him out and away from his electronic "devices." Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Exceeded my expectations. Bought for my 7 year old granddaughter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very fun.
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old loooooves this thing. He struggled the first couple of days but then he mastered it! Very fun.
customer_reviews.author: lulin

customer_reviews.title: It's good.
customer_reviews.text: Works well, easy to use, notjing fancy, just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: It’s a little hard for my kids (9 and 8 years old) but they will get the hang of it with practice and I’m sure it will last for years to come. It’s really sturdy After only 10 days my 9 years old cab do 710 jumps and my 8 yo 150
customer_reviews.author: Tiziana

customer_reviews.title: Saving my sanity
customer_reviews.text: He’s jumping like a champ on that thing. Perfect for overactive 10-year-old to burn off some steam !
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old son loves it! I wanted to get him something that would help with his balance and strengthen his core and legs (he’s a wrestler) but still be fun. The kids in our neighborhood love it too. It’s very sturdy and GREAT quality!
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn Settembrino

customer_reviews.title: works great and my kids love it
customer_reviews.text: has been durable and lasted all summer. only problem is the hand grips are just foam and wear off quick. I would recommend the manufacture put grips similar to a bike grip on the handles
customer_reviews.author: Kraig

customer_reviews.title: Great desing for kids 10+
customer_reviews.text: Great for kids 10+ , if younger the Pogo stick will be too sturdy for use. Also if you are over 170lbs it won't work well. Overall is a great product, the look the feel and design are amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Heriberto Nieves Arvelo

customer_reviews.title: Its a nice toy!
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a good size and its nice and sturdy but not too heavy so the child cant play on it. I wish they had a more feminine color but green will be just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Y

customer_reviews.title: very sturdy and bouncy
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this. very sturdy and bouncy. he is 10 and 90 lbs and a perfect size with lots of room to grow
customer_reviews.author: NC

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Color Sent!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The product is great so I ordered another one; however, my kiddo is VERY disappointed since I ordered a green and black one, not the yellow and black the second time. :-(
customer_reviews.author: Halle11

customer_reviews.title: Great pogo stick
customer_reviews.text: Love the product but hate the way it was shipped! Wasn’t in a shipping box so if this is a gift beware.
customer_reviews.author: jovigirlnj

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it! I can use even it! I max it out, but still works!
customer_reviews.author: ME

customer_reviews.title: loved it for Christmas
customer_reviews.text: Seemingly a durable pogo stick. My grandson, age 10, loved it for Christmas. It is not made for your kids.
customer_reviews.author: Amazons Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very durable
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my 9 year old brother in law, who weighs roughly 120 pounds. Its Awesome. It's very durable. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Sebastian

customer_reviews.title: It does not work as specified.
customer_reviews.text: The pogo stick does not function for the weight it claims to. My grandson cannot make it work. Nothing has been arranged by the company to refund, replace or exchange product.
customer_reviews.author: alicia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Grandson loves it and so does his dad and uncle.
customer_reviews.author: Clark H. Perman

customer_reviews.title: Not correct order or as durable
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2. One black and green and the other red. Got 2 black and green. First time use the bolt at the top broke on one of them and we had to figure out a way to fix it.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is sturdy but really difficult for my 70 lb daughter to “push” down- she gave up on it
customer_reviews.author: CN  keetch

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for kids
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my 9 year old. She loves it. Her 11 year old brother thinks it is great as well. It seems to be well made and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Emily K. Coro

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Our grandson loves his pogo stick. Bright green, great color, will enjoy for years to come!
customer_reviews.author: maria stiefeld

customer_reviews.title: Very good purchase, buy it you will not be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old loves this pogo stick. It's durable and can hold weight upward 150 pounds. Very good purchase, buy it you will not be disappointed.

customer_reviews.title: Nice bounce
customer_reviews.text: The product came in a timely manner. The durability of this product seems to be really good.

customer_reviews.title: Great Pogo Stick
customer_reviews.text: My kids love it. Pay attention to the weight limits, a smaller child could not make it bounce.

customer_reviews.title: Kids enjoy them.
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 brands to get on line kids out of the house. One had a center guard that did not have screws to keep it on

customer_reviews.title: It great to find my grandson a birthday present that lights up his face
customer_reviews.text: The item was great exactly what my grandson wanted for a birthday gift he enjoys it greatly
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Very well made!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a Christmas gift for my 10 year old Grandson and am so happy I did!! He mastered it in about 15 minutes! He really enjoys it as soon as he comes home from school!!

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son for his 13th birthday. He loves it!!! Bouncing all over the place!!!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my son. He loves it.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: For a beginner . I need a intermediate level or advanced.. very disappointed

customer_reviews.text: It is strong enough for all my kids to ride it. They love it.

customer_reviews.title: HELP!  Please let me know if I need a replacement tips for this Pogo stick. Thank you!

customer_reviews.text: The rubber thing on the bottom kept coming off so we ordered another one and that one did the same thing

customer_reviews.title: It's a great activity to get kids outside
customer_reviews.text: My Grandson loves it. It's a great activity to get kids outside.

customer_reviews.title: I hope this is a better way for you to be okay
customer_reviews.text: I broke my foot in the last month and it was so bad

customer_reviews.title: ONLY LASTED 15 minutes.
customer_reviews.text: The rubber bottom of the pogo stick came out and was missing within 15 minutes of use. My 11 year old son played outside on the pogo stick for 15 minutes before the rubber piece at the bottom came out. We can’t find it and it now skids on our rock/concrete driveway and collects dirt/grass when used on our lawn. I am trying to find a replacement piece. $55.99 for 15 minutes of use is not a good purchase. I do not recommend this product. It’s made cheap and not dependable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's sturdy and safe
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was hoping for. It's sturdy and safe. Perfect!!!
customer_reviews.author: John Muselli

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 and spring bouce is not consistent between the two.
customer_reviews.author: C CARTER

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: Son is 10 1/2. Weight 77lbs and is 55” tall. He has NO PROBLEM getting this stick to bounce. My only concern is what do I do when the rubber base piece wears away...he’s used it about three times outside and it’s showing wear already....
customer_reviews.author: Debra RishmawiTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Solid platform and great fun for my 12 year old.
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: Nice Stick
customer_reviews.text: Nice stick with good looks and the sturdy feel. However after a few jumps, the bottom rubber cushion came out and had to be glued.

product_meta.title: New Bounce Pogo Stick for Kids - Pogo Sticks for Ages 9 and Up, 80 to 160 Lbs - Pro Sport Edition, Quality, Easy Grip, PogoStick for Hours of Wholesome Fun
product_meta.description:
New Bounce Pogo Stick
This rugged pogo stick is perfect for beginner to intermediate riders. Recommended for children 9 and up, this modern adaptation of the classic toy will guarantee hours of wholesome fun. 
Easily supports up to 160 lbs. The minimum weight required to be able to use the pogo stick is 80 lbs. 
It is sure to promote healthy and exciting fun for boys and girls of all ages. 
The Pogo Stick features a metal frame covered in precision-made foam, replaceable non-slip foot pads, and easy-grip foam handles. 

Safety is a priority Designed to be safe as well as fun for children, we took many precautions to ensure the safety of your child. 
Wide stance and easy grip handles provide better balance.
Replaceable non-slip foot pads for increased stability.
Foam coating keeps you and the pogostick better protected.
It is always recommended to use safety gear and helmets while using the pogo stick. 
Only use and a flat, firm surface. 

Great Exercise Opportunity.
You can burn up to 300 calories in half an hour by pogoing. Awesome way to lose weight and improve balance. 
Your back is the cornerstone of pogo stick movements. As you work to maintain your balance, your back gets a workout, and every move you make on the pogo stick requires your back to help stabilize you.
You can also focuse on your core by tensing your abs as you jump up and down.

New Bounce
New Bounce is known for providing quality products at an outstanding value. Our mission is to provide your children with toys, games, and play accessories that they can enjoy for years to come. So rest assured that you are buying the best of the best. If you ever have any issue with any of our products, our friendly customer service team is standing by to take your call and resolve the matter.
feature_bullets: PERFECT FOR BIG KIDS - Designed for older kids (and adults), the Pogo Stick can withstand up to 160 lbs easily. Minimum required weight for the Pro Sport edition, is 80 lbs. Perfect for beginner and intermediate riders.
QUALITY THAT SPEAKS FOR ITSELF - We never settle for anything less than top-quality, at every step of the manufacturing process, from sourcing to delivery. Amazing gift that will last for years.

SOFT, EASY-GRIP FOAM HANDLES AND FRAME - Added for your comfort and safety, the foam coating provides a great cushioned grip. Besides for protecting you and the Pogo Stick it adds style and keeps it looking awesome.
WIDER STANCE FOR INCREASED SAFETY - The specially designed wide stance is more stable, and makes it easier to bounce with. Show off your tricks with ease. Safety gear and helmets are recommended.

SATISFACTION GUARANTEED - New Bounce works hard to ensure that they only carry top of the line products. However, if you have any issue with the Pogo Sticks at any time, please contact our friendly customer service team, and we will be sure to resolve any issue right away.
